ygData.subject: Re: Blued Hammer
ygData.msgSnippet: OK the third piece is found on the Commander (Commander Wynd or something). RARE spawn maybe MAYBE once a week.  He spawns near the throne room.  He carries
ygData.messageBody:
OK the third piece is found on the Commander (Commander Wynd or something).
RARE spawn maybe MAYBE once a week. He spawns near the throne room. He
carries the final piece that allows you to combine and you DO not get the
blued hammer, you get some mallet, which is one damage/delay less than the
summoned hammer but is +10 to magic resistance.

We took him down with a full party of level 20's. Sapped all the healers
and casters mana and our paladin had to use LOH. We won in the end but both
our wizards died. I would say his 25 to 28th level, only because he
resisted the wizards spells about 40% of the time.

Jaade D'Vinn
Indigo Sista Soldier
